name: Order Status Per Product For Woocommerce
author: silverplugins217

sections.description:
Order Status Per Product For Woocommerce plugin is important your woocommerce store.

Order Status Per Product For Woocommerce plugin will provide you a lot of scope in order management. Right from the moment an order is placed on your store, till it is delivered, the process continues.Different order statuses will help customers.Here is a list of WooCommerce Custom Order Status Manager Plugins that will help you manage orders more efficiently.

ðŸŒŸ Documentation | ðŸŒŸ Demo | ðŸŒŸ Support

WITH THE CART PDF FOR WOOCOMMERCE YOU CAN:

  • Easy to use
  • Enable/Disable Plugin
  • Select Date Format
  • Status Display Format
  • Status Title, Color and Note
  • Remove Status and Add Status
  • WPML Support

CONTRIBUTE AND TRANSLATE

Order Status Per Product For Woocommerce is translated into multiple languages Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, and many more. Help localize Woocommerce even further by adding your locale Language. Click Here
